org.mozilla.jss.pkix.cmc

Class OtherInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mozilla.jss.pkix.cmc.OtherInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ASN1Value

    public class OtherInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements ASN1Value
    CMCStatusInfo OtherInfo: 
       OtherInfo ::= CHOICE { 
       failInfo INTEGER, 
       pendInfo PendInfo 
   }
